Title: Homecoming
Writer: Jonathan Tropper (created by), David Schickler (created by), Jonathan Tropper
Actors: Antony Starr, Ivana Milicevic, Ulrich Thomsen, Frankie Faison
Plot: Rabbit is hiding in a New York church. Job pays him a visit. Burton does what he does best. Another revelation in the Hopewell household will test them all. Lucas and Carrie prepare for a grand face-off in NY. Emmett's fate is revealed.
